Name: team_size_within_bounds
Description: Teams should operate within acceptable size limits

Name: only_active_workers_assigned
Description: Only workers with active status are allocated to work

Name: user_story_priority_allowed
Description: Only user stories with acceptable priority enter sprint

Name: task_status_permitted
Description: Tasks must be in allowable statuses to be scheduled

Name: feature_status_ready_only
Description: Only features marked ready are planned for release

Name: sprint_status_open_only
Description: Sprint must be open to receive work

Name: backlog_status_active
Description: Product backlog must be active for refinement

Name: stakeholder_relevance_required
Description: Stakeholders must be relevant to reviewed features

Name: skill_certified_when_required
Description: Required skills must be certified when policy demands

Name: release_status_permitted
Description: Release plan must be in a deployable status

Name: retrospective_moderation_set
Description: Retrospective must have a designated moderation

Name: planning_outcome_documented
Description: Sprint planning must produce outcome documentation
